title: Which Font is on the Warner Bros Logo?
content:
Hi there!  
I'm new here and not a native english speaker. So sorry for mistakes.

I'm searching for good sample applications for the PMN Caecilia, when I saw the Warner Bros. Logo.  
The text "Warner Bros. Picture" really looks like it, but i saw that they use this font since the 1980s. PMN Caecilia was released in 1990...  
And my second thought: the letters are not as broad as the Caecilia. But the letters have the same design.  
So I'm a bit confused. Maybe you can help me? Does anyone know which font Warner Bros. use?  
thx

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [example.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150203045007/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202013-03-10%20um%2021.42.00.png) | 66.25 KB |
author: San_

comments.content: Except for the W, it looks a lot like [ITC Charter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150203045007/http:/myfonts.us/td-Owl6pT) (1987).
